参与开发Teradata14.10功能开发。
Job Description:
The candidate’s major task is database/query tuning and performance optimization for high-throughput and high capacity databases, and will also help to define requirements, participate in design and implement subsystems.

Education Requirements: 

ü       Master's or Ph.D. degree in Computer Science or related areas (Computer Engineering, Applied Mathematics, etc.). 

ü       Exceptional candidates with Bachelor's degree and more than 3 years of experiences in database field and strong technical background will also be considered. 

Desired Experience and Skill Set:

ü       Proficiency in SQL

ü       At least three years of experience as a full-time database developer in an enterprise environment. 

ü       3+ years experience with database system or other large-scale system and application performance tuning, Oracle DBA or other commercial database is a plus。 

ü       Familiarity with physical database modeling, database index structures and index utilization.

ü       Basic knowledge of application architecture.

ü       Basic software development skills in C/C++/Java

ü       Excellent problem solver 

ü       Excellent team player

ü       Good verbal and written communication skills in both Chinese and English 


有意者请发简历到dz250000@teradata.com。谢谢！
